column2: and Smoque is as good as anywhere I've eaten
column3: from trendy restaurant to BBQ shack on the road to the MS Delta. True
column4: Smoque lacks the atmosphere of a Yazoo juke joint
column7: don't miss the chicken - I finally ordered the chicken after several brisket and ribs only visits
column8: and realized what I'd been missing - makes you lick yo fingas! I've stood in line in the snow
column11: and I would do it again and again.
